keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The Aurora Prize for Awakening Humanity is meant to honor those whose exceptional work to preserve human life in disasters created by humans puts them in great peril.

headline.print_headline: Finalists Picked for New Prize Created in Memory of Armenian Genocide
headline.main: Finalists Picked for New Prize Created in Memory of Armenian Genocide

snippet: The Aurora Prize for Awakening Humanity is meant to honor those whose exceptional work to preserve human life in disasters created by humans puts them in great peril.
abstract: Marguerite Barankitse, Dr Tom Catena, Syeda Ghulam Fatima and Rev Bernard Kinvi are named finalists for Aurora Prize for Awakening Humanity, created in memory of Armenian genocide; will attend ceremony in Yerevan, Armenia, on April 24, where winner will be announced.
